author: cheenu1424
title: Nice and comfortable stay
text:
I booked this hotel for two days but due to my work was extended, i had to stay for 6 days.... I prefered to stay here itself..
My reservation was well handled and I was given a good room.
Good air conditioning and 24 hours hot water, which some time not available in all hotels in Uganda...
Bed comfort is good. Bed sheets are changed everyday!!!
The staff is very helpful and every one looked after us their own guest..
The hotel is clean and staff are very friendly and helpful. The Ruby restaurant at basement provides excellent breakfast, lunch dinner almost round the clock. Room service is fast and efficient.
Amazing hospitality.
Plenty of car park space available. The hotel is easily accessible by Taxi or by Boda.
There is a well stocked supermarket at the ground floor, which is also a part of this hotel. You will get most of your daily needs here.
Just one minor setback during my visit was, the hotel entrance is locked after midnight and there is no one is easily spotted to call and open the gates....otherwise this hotel I think is one of the best I stayed....
Definitely recommend this hotel...
Room Tip: take a room just off Kira road.. See more room tips
